title: Secrétaire
description: Secrétaire; Jacques Dubois (French, 1694 - 1763, master 1742); Paris, France; about 1755; Maple and oak veneered with panels of red Chinese lacquer on a ground of Japanese arborvitae and painted with vernis Martin (imitation Asian lacquer); drawers of Japanese arborvitae; gilt-bronze mounts; brèche d'Alep top; 102.8 x 114.3 x 38.4 cm (40 1/2 x 45 x 15 1/8 in.); 65.DA.3; Gift of J. Paul Getty; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
